column5: Remote connection: Average WiFi speed (Mbps per second)
column6: Co-working spaces: Number of co-working spaces
column7: Caffeine: Average price of buying a coffee
column8: Travel: Average price of taxi (per km)
column9: After-work drinks: Average price for 2 beers in a bar
column10: Accommodation: Average price of 1 bedroom apartment per month
column11: Food: Average cost of a meal at a local, mid-level restaurant
column12: Climate: Average number of sunshine hours
column13: Tourist attractions: Number of ‘Things to do’ on Tripadvisor
